relation: Well the are many Intramural and Extra curricular sports to pay. Clubs and Organizations to join.
They have a large dining area and have heard that they are introducing Culinary arts.
It is a 2yr commuter school. No dorms.
When attending Montco, you need to come here ready for success. The faculty work hard to make every student ready to go on to 4 yr schools.
Its a very intensely academic school. They strive to put you in the best place once you move forward with schooling. Its always looking to update and strive for the best.
pageTitle: Montgomery County Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

textAfterTable: Alex from Philadelphia, PA 07/19/2011 Reviewer is Accepted here and planning to attend soon. Reviewer has been to campus. 2 of 46 Categories Comments Great for these types of students They live closeby, intend to study for 2 year degree or a certificate and enjoy friendly social environment. Will learn a lot Since I have not been to a college for long, this would be a big change and challenge for me.
